channel.title: Jibreel,Mohammad,Musa,Guidence on MeVsFalse
channel.description: Recent content in Jibreel,Mohammad,Musa,Guidence on MeVsFalse

item.title: Musa is not Jibreel
item.description: Introduction Anyone claiming that Moses is actually Gabriel and using Surat Sajdah, Ayah 23 to back it up is basically waving a flag that says, “I might need a Quranic compass.” Understanding the rich themes of the Quran is like diving into an epic adventure, and mixing up Moses and Gabriel? Well, that’s like confusing the message of quran. 32:23 وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ فَلَا تَكُن فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآئِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هُدٗى لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ — Quran1
